title: 10/27/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/27/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to the MMQB's Albert Breer about the Deshaun Watson situation. Will we see him moved before the deadline? Jeopardy's 38x Winner Matt Amodio stops by the studio and does some baseball trivia. And David Ortiz calls in to recap Game 1 of the World Series and 100% confirms that it was blood on Curt Schilling's sock in '04.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to the MMQB's Albert Breer about the Deshaun Watson situation. Will we see him moved before the deadline? Jeopardy's 38x Winner Matt Amodio stops by the studio and does some baseball trivia. And David Ortiz calls in to recap Game 1 of the World Series and 100% confirms that it was blood on Curt Schilling's sock in '04.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
